name: Diary of a certain A: Chapter I
name_original: Diary of a certain A: Chapter I
description:
Don't panic. Bre-e-eathe in, bre-e-eathe out.

He wants to make some friends, but he is just so scared.

After 8 years of home schooling, a boy who calls himself Andrei enrols into an international school in Moscow, which specializes in teaching foreign students. He has everything he needs for amazing school days:

  • Low communication skills;
  • Poor understanding of popular topics;
  • Classmates' complexes;
  • A strange Asian shorty, who seems to be a good person in a difficult situation.

And what else?

WARNING, THIS GAME CONTAINS THE FOLLOWING TRIGGERS:

  • Death,
  • Suicide,
  • School shooting,
  • Bullying,
  • Swearing,
  • Family problems/abuse.
